content.description: The printRightToLeft method is intended to print the elements in the ArrayList words in reverse order. For example, if words contains ["jelly bean", "jukebox", "jewelry"], the method should produce the following output.
content.question: jewelryjukeboxjelly beanThe method is shown below.public static void printRightToLeft(ArrayList<String> words){if (words.size() > 0){System.out.println(words.get(words.size() - 1));/* missing code */}}Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the printRightToLeft method works as intended?

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
